text: Zorlu Holding is one of the biggest holding company in Turkey. It was founded by HacÄ± Mehmet Zorlu. The curret chairman of this holding company is Ahmet Nazif Zorlu. Zorlu Holding companies are active in the areas of textiles, white goods and electronics manufacturing, energy, and financial services. == References == Category:Holding companies of Turkey
title: Zorlu Holding
